item.title: Clock is ticking: TikTok could go dark in U.S. on Jan. 19 as federal court upholds ban
item.description: A federal appeals court in Washington on Friday upheld a law banning TikTok in the U.S. unless it's sold by Jan. 19.

item.title: Trump appoints former Sen. David Perdue to be ambassador to China
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump on Thursday announced that he picked former Sen. David Perdue to serve as U.S. ambassador to China.
